attributes.action: support immediate withdrawal for Scotland from the UK to become a sovereign state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland wants independance, so let them have it. They must stand as an independant nation with not one penny of financial support from England, no Scottish MPs to stand in the English Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
